locations.name: Small Town of Eldridge
locations.description: A quaint town in the Midwest, seemingly untouched by modernity until a terrifying event unfolds.

characters.name: Tom Harrison
characters.physical_description: Tall, with a rugged look and scars on his arms from previous encounters with wild animals.
characters.demeanor: Calm under pressure but quick to anger when it comes to protecting the town he loves.
motivations: Saving as many people as possible
characters.character_arc: From a skeptic of the mutated dogs to a leader fighting for survival.

main_plot.Introduction: A series of strange dog attacks occur in Eldridge, starting with small incidents like pets going missing.
main_plot.Inciting Incident: The town experiences an unprecedented attack by large, aggressive canines that seem almost supernatural.
main_plot.Rising Action: Tom Harrison leads the resistance against the mutant dogs while trying to understand their origins and weaknesses.
main_plot.Climax: A final showdown in the heart of Eldridge as Tom confronts the leader dog who seems intelligent beyond canine capability.
main_plot.Falling Action: With the threat seemingly neutralized, survivors begin the long process of recovery and rebuilding.
main_plot.Resolution: The movie ends with an ambiguous note on whether all threats have truly been eliminated.

subplots.title: Dr. Emily Carter's Research
subplots.purpose: To understand the science behind the canine mutations, possibly offering clues for a cure or neutralizing agent.
keypoints: Researching historical accounts of strange occurrences in Eldridge
intersections_with_main: The discovery that the mutant dogs are highly intelligent and may have a hive mind

key_story_events.Dog Attacks Escalate: Initially seen as isolated incidents, the attacks grow in frequency and intensity.
key_story_events.Emergency Meeting with Town Leaders: Tom convinces the town leaders to take action against the mutant dogs before it's too late.
key_story_events.Revelation of Dog Intelligence: Evidence that these dogs are not just mindless beasts but a highly intelligent threat emerges.
